meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of eye disorders.
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmologists at the clinic helped me with my eye problem.
meanings.sent2: Many ophthalmologists work in hospitals and eye clinics.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmologists had a keen eye for spotting even the tiniest issues.
meanings.sent4: She was like an ophthalmologist, carefully examining every detail.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmologists' expertise in eye care was truly impressive.

meanings.sent1: We visited two ophthalmologists for our eye check-ups.
meanings.sent2: The conference was attended by ophthalmologists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmologists gathered for a group photo, all wearing glasses.
meanings.sent4: The team of ophthalmologists worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmologists' office was filled with the latest eye care equipment.
